name: Sixteensource Foundation
mission: To empower underprivileged communities in rural India by providing access to quality education, healthcare, livelihood opportunities, and basic amenities. We strive to create sustainable, community-driven development that brings lasting positive change to people's lives.
vision: A society where every individual, regardless of their economic or social background, has equal opportunities to live with dignity, access quality education and healthcare, and build a prosperous future for themselves and their families.

values.title: Compassion
values.description: We lead with empathy and kindness in every action, understanding the challenges faced by marginalized communities.

values.title: Collaboration
values.description: We believe in the power of partnerships - with communities, governments, corporates, and individuals to create greater impact.

values.title: Sustainable Impact
values.description: We focus on creating long-term, measurable change that empowers communities to become self-reliant and prosperous.

values.title: Inclusivity
values.description: Every voice matters. We ensure equal participation and benefit for all, regardless of caste, religion, or gender.

values.title: Transparency
values.description: We maintain complete transparency in our operations, financials, and impact reporting to build trust with our stakeholders.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We are committed to delivering high-quality programs and maintaining professional standards in all our work.
